original_text: “If a man has an emission of semen, he shall bathe his whole body in water and be unclean until the evening.
korean_text: 설정한 자는 전신을 물로 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: If a man has an emission of semen
he shall bathe his whole body in water
and be unclean until the evening.
